info.author: Babylon Ltd.
info.description: This comprehensive Arabic-English dictionary contains words, phrases, abbreviations & acronyms. It includes terms from a vast variety of subjects, such as Medicine, Electronics, Zoology, Business, Computers, Religion, etc.

article.definition: information about something that is written down or stored on computer, film etc so that it can be looked at in the future
a vehicle with four wheels and an engine, that can carry a small number of passengers
You can have text in bold or in a different color

[<tr>ho:um</tr>] <pos><abr>n.</abr></pos> <rref start="16384" size="512"> sounds_of_words.ogg </rref> 1) One's own dwelling place; the house in which one lives. 2) One's native land; the place or country in which one dwells. 3) The abiding place of the affections. <ex>For without hearts there is no home.</ex>
